segments.en: Support for the eight-hour workday movement was growing rapidly despite the indifference and hostility of many union leaders.

segments.en: Previous legislative attempts to improve working conditions had failed, so labor organizers took drastic measures.

segments.en: They passed a resolution stating that eight hours would constitute a legal day's work.
